response.original_title: MPB de Câmara - A Canção Brasileira
response.overview: The documentary immerses itself in the universe of Brazilian music with an intimate gaze, focusing on the 'chamber' format—that is, softer, more sophisticated arrangements featuring small ensembles of instruments or voices, far removed from the grandeur of large-scale concerts. The film explores the poetic and musical construction of the Brazilian popular song, highlighting the intimacy shared between performer, composer, and audience.
response.title: MPB de Câmara - A Canção Brasileira
